Texts.Chs: 助长计划进展顺利。这些耳廓狐是具有高度适应性的快速学习者，尽管他们显示出缺乏使用星际标准语言的能力。这无疑是由于他们的语言器官是的运作机理，而不是他们自己的问题。
Texts.Eng: Uplifting is going well. These Fenerox are highly adaptable and fast learners, though they do show a lack of capacity for using the galactic standard tongue. This is undoubtedly due to how their speech organs operate, and no fault of their own.

Texts.Chs: 我们已经企图创作了异种修改版本，他们可以使用至少近似元音和辅音的发音。 然而，尽管如此，他们似乎没有什么能力写下这门语言。他们更喜欢用手势而不是标志
Texts.Eng: We've attemtped to create a modified version that they can use to at least approximate the vowel and consonant sounds. Despite all of this, however, they appear to have very little capability for writing the language down. They prefer to use hand gestures to 'sign'

Texts.Chs: 有人甚至提到，等他学会写字的时候，他已经老了，头发也白了，因为太无聊了，他花了太长时间才弄明白。
Texts.Eng: it was too boring and took too long to figure out.

Texts.Chs: 他们说话的时候，他们的语言，和任何数量的教他们的信都会遇到怀疑或烦恼。他们动作很快，但是他们写作(按照他们的说法)花的时间也太长了。
Texts.Eng: their words as they speak, and any amount of teaching them letters is met with doubt or annoyance. They move very swiftly, and writing (accoring to them) takes entirely too long. One even mentioned that he would be old and grey by the time he learned to write, because
